entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:55 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
